lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Widespread strikes have not seriously disrupted Spain's economy and wage restrictions are likely to continue as policy makers call for more austerity to help the country compete in the European Community (EC), foreign bankers and analysts said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "The money supply should be back on track by the summer and we will begin to see lower interest rates," said Andres Trujillo, general manager of Hong Kong and Shanghai Banking Corp's Madrid branch.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He told Reuters the labour protests, despite occasional outbursts of violence, are not having a serious impact on foreign investment.
